article: 55 After the birth of my second child, I got a job at a restaurant. Having worked with an experienced _ for a few days, I was _ to wait tables on my own. All went _ that first week. When Saturday night came, I was luckily _ the tables not far from the kitchen. _ , I still felt a little hard to carry the heavy trays Before I knew it, the _ was full of people. I moved slowly, _ every step. I remember how _ I was when I saw the tray stand near the tables, it looked different from the one I was _ on. It had nice handles which made it _ to move around. I was pleased with everything and began to _ I was a natural at this job. Then, an old man came to me and said, Excuse me, dear, my wife and I loved _ you work. It seems your tray stand has been very _ to you, but we are getting ready to _ now, and my wife needs her _ back. At first his _ did not get across. What was he talking about! Then I got it. I had set my trays on his wife's orthopedic walker . I stood frozen as ice, but my face was _ . I wanted to get into a hole and _ . Since then, I have learned from many mistakes such as the one I just _ , I have learned to be more _ and not to be too sure of myself.
